name: Toss Dat' Ragdoll!
description: So, I'm real young(smaller than a teen)...and ummmmm..i am into coding(and physics and ragdolls), but i am still new to it. So, i made this....its kinda sucks....but eh, please download.....Thanks for the support...(oh, and btw the exit button in the 'Three thick stickman' and two thic stickman doesnt work....so use Alt+f4,please.
